name: Furry Horse
description:
V1.1 can't generate horse dicks on its own. The example image used my horse dick LoRA.

Updated version 1.1, this version is more cooperative with other LoRAs. Like my Horse dick LoRA.
The overall style of v1.1 is slightly different from v1.
V1.1 is not completely better than v1, v1 even performs better in some cases, you can keep v1 for inpaint or generating images.
I suggest switching between the two versions flexibly.
V1.1 using the tag Horse will be more effective than v1.

Added Horse dick LoRA. Works fine with version v1.1. This set of LoRAs is exactly the same as the horse dick LoRA I released independently. Works fine on Anything-v4.5.

About Horse dick LoRA:
The Horse dick LoRA can be used to generate horse dicks, mainly used on Futanari, but can also be used on men, traps, etc.
Prompting Penis to trigger, other similar words are also useful.

This LoRA contains two versions, v1, and v1inpaint. v1 is good at generating basic images, v1inpaint is good at inpainting, but can also generate.

The inpaint version is better only used on the penis, not the overall image.

Both can be used independently, maybe you can find a way to use them that suits you.

--

v1 released

Type prompt Furry and Anthro to trigger.
Horse, equine, and equid also works, but should be used with anthro and furry.
Horse, equine, and equid sometimes will have bad effects, perhaps they tend to be classified as animals rather than people. Maybe there are other ways to improve.

Works well on AbyssOrange2, can also be used on similar models.

This LoRA is mainly trained on mares and traps, not very good at generating stallions.

Not good at generating horse dicks, need to use other LoRAs.
